title: ok i know no ones going to believe me but i swear on my life its true!!
body:
i have 0 evidence but word of mouth, about a month ago i was drawing new odyssey skin ideas (will upload later in a second post) and i was thinking of another enemy for the odyssey skins and i thought of odyssey zed with full golden armor and he had 3 eyes and and purple was his secondary color and he had galaxys in his shadows, in other words what im saying is the skin idea i had looked VERY VERY similar to the new skin teaser IM NOT TAKING CREDIT dont get me wrong, just saying we had similar ideas but unfortunately i was lazy and never drew it out, just thought of it. but im am very glad to see this new skin for zed and ill be instabuying, also the new invictous skins look great, finally riot some good fuckin skins. 

ps rito hire me great minds think alike

replies.body: Prove it. Travel back in time and post your skin idea before they show us the new legendary Zed skin.
AS soon as i can find ekko or zillean i gotchu
